page.title: 06Football
page.content: Odcombe Football Club is one of the oldest clubs in the{Yeovil and {district fooball league}being started as far back as 1920 or earlier. In about 1973 Odcombe had 2 teams quite high in the league but now there is only 1. The team is picked from about 18 players, 5 or 6 of them live in the village and others have links with the village. The clubs colours are yellow and blue and the football pitch is next to the Village Hall with changing rooms at the back of the hall itself. I sometimes go to watch them play and so does my friend. We both think it is very good. They have a few injuries. We were there when the brother of one of my friends got kicked in the back.We wouldn't like to play because of the risk of injury. They have big crowds watching them on Sunday.
